channel.title: Books on Experiment In Art
channel.description: Recent content in Books on Experiment In Art

item.title: Reading list
item.description: I want to be a more considered and intentional reader, so I am going to record each book that I read. That is what a considered and intentional reader would do, right? I do not include study textbooks in this list. Summary book_0 <- c("Non Fiction", "The Tao Is Silent", "Raymond M. Smullyan", "2019-11-01", "TBC", "0", "") book_0_df <- data.frame(t(book_0), stringsAsFactors = FALSE) names(book_0_df) <- names(reading_list) book_1 <- c("Non Fiction", "The Joy Of Less", "Francine Jay", "2019-12-31", "TBC", "0", "") book_1_df <- data.
